resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107761</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107761</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770204494</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Sex under the influence</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschlecht unter dem Einfluß</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sexe sous l'influence</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sexo sob a influência</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sesso sotto l'influenza</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλο κάτω από την επιρροή</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sexo bajo influencia</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The use of alcohol and other drugs increases the risk for unplanned, unprotected sex. This action exposes young people to HIV, other STDs, and pregnancy. T</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Gebrauch des Spiritus und anderer Drogen 
erhöht die Gefahr für ungeplantes, ungeschütztes Geschlecht. 
Diese Tätigkeit setzt junge Leute HIV, anderes STDs und 
Schwangerschaft aus. T</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'utilisation de l'alcool et d'autres drogues 
augmente le risque pour le sexe non planifié et non protégé. 
Cette action expose les jeunes à HIV, à tout autre STDs, et à
grossesse. T</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O uso do álcool e das outras drogas aumenta o 
risco para sexo unplanned, desprotegido. Esta ação expõe 
povos novos ao HIV, ao outro STDs, e à gravidez. T</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'uso di alcool e di altre droghe aumenta il 
rischio per il sesso non pianificato e non protetto. Questa 
azione espone i giovani al HIV, all'altro STDs ed alla gravidanza. 
T</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η χρήση του οινοπνεύματος και άλλων ναρκωτικών 
αυξάνει τον κίνδυνο για το μη σχεδιασμένο, μη προστατευμένο φύλο.
Αυτή η ενέργεια εκθέτει τους νέους στο HIV, άλλο 
STDs, και την εγκυμοσύνη. Τ</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El uso del alcohol y de otras drogas aumenta el 
riesgo para el sexo imprevisto, desprotegido. Esta acción 
expone a gente joven al VIH, al otro STDs, y al embarazo. T</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:KATHY CRUMPLER
FN:KATHY CRUMPLER
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770204494</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107761</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/sex-under-the-influence</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
